result.purpose: Responsible for managing a pool of workers to process jobs concurrently.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating worker management and job processing functionalities within distinct files.

pkg/worker/config.go.purpose: Defines a configuration structure for a worker package.

pkg/worker/dispatcher.go.purpose: Manages a pool of workers to process jobs concurrently.
risks: Potential deadlocks if worker pool is exhausted
Race conditions if not properly synchronized

pkg/worker/job.go.purpose: Defines a Job struct with an executable function.

pkg/worker/worker.go.purpose: This file defines a Worker type that manages job execution in a worker pool.
side_effects: Starts a goroutine for job processing
risks: Potential deadlock if not managed properly with WaitGroup
